name: metaBall
description:
Metaball is a free-to-play, crossplay-enabled, and online multiplayer sports game based on Basketball that combines fast-paced movements, thrilling ranked matches, and advanced team play.
You play as a Rider, trying to bring fame and wealth to his name by winning merciless Metaball League games with his teammates and collecting M-coins and Rank points.



Hop on your hoverboard, grab the ball with your chain, and use its swinging power to perform diverse actions.
Dunk, shoot, block, and steal the ball while using the nitro to boost your speed or perform double or triple jumps!



Play versus other Riders in different game modes such as quick match, ranked, or private match!



After each match, you will receive coins and points depending on the result. So make sure to win and to be the MVP to receive a bonus!
The more you have rank points, the more you will unlock rewards and exclusive benefits!



With your hard-earned currencies and points, unlock different levels at the special shop, progress in the Meta Pass, and buy your favorite pieces of equipment and items to use in the game!

Items shown may require separate purchases from the in-game store and are subject to availability. Contains in-game purchases.
